strapiPost.title: Pastafina Voted Best Italian Restaurant in NWA
strapiPost.content:
Only In Your State featured Pastafina as NWA’s best Italian restaurant. 

  • Vibes: Located at 1045 E Lowell Ave in Cave Springs, the restaurant has a cozy, casual atmosphere and serves up pasta that will rival your grandma’s. 
  • Bon appetit: The article recommended the chicken parmesan and the penne and meatballs, or the salmon piccata for seafood lovers. Save room for their delicious tiramisu, if you’re able - their portions are huge! 

Check out the restaurant highlight HERE.
